1.title: Defining Your Investment Goals - Part 1

episode of.title: Stock Investing: Become a Wealthy Douchebag (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: In this course we first identify many of the pitfalls that face investors. By highlighting where so many go wrong, we hope to help investors learn to avoid these losing strategies. Then we recommend one particular path for investors to follow - a value-investment philosophy.
